author: bridge-bot
content:
<KamilChNethermind> @sam_cm @mattyevans looking at dash for the tip of chain processing Nethermind uses some pretty old 1.35.2 - can we also ask for a bump to use master branch so it is a bit better?

Also wondering how we can use this monitoring capability for upcoming changes - not necessarily backwards compatible like DB schema changes - any chance to add one more machine then for Nethermind running in such mode?
